name: snug snek :)
description:
ENTER/X to play,
U/Z to undo,
R to restart,
WASD to move.

A single screen puzzle created for the Confounding Calendar 2022. 

Made using ClementSparrow's Pattern:Script.

Keep them snug and covered. Some sacrifices may be required, but you'll just keep growing.
This might be tricky, so feel free to try things and undo if they don't work out!

I might turn this into something bigger later, but no concrete plans yet!
